v.v: A continual desire to sin is in the inner beings of wicked people.
Because they want to believe good things about themselves,
Everything that they say is deceitful and full of lies;
While they are lying on their beds, they plan to do things to harm others;
Yahweh, your faithful love for us reaches as high as the heavens;
Your righteous behavior is as permanent as the highest mountains;
God, your faithful love for us is very precious.
You provide for us plenty of food from the abundant supply that you have;
You are the one who causes everything to live;
Continue to faithfully love those who are faithful to you,
Do not allow proud people to attack me,
Look where evil people have fallen on the ground, defeated;

v: They consider that they do not need to have an awesome respect for God.
they do not think that God knows and hates their sins.
they no longer do what is good
they are determined to do things that are not good,
and they never refuse to do what is evil.
your faithfulness in doing what you have promised extends up to the clouds.
your acting justly will continue as long as the deepest oceans will continue.
You take care of people and you take care of animals.
You protect us like birds protect their baby birds under their wings .
your great gifts flow to us like a river.
your light is what enables us to know the truth about you.
and protect those who act righteously.
or allow wicked people to chase me away.
they were thrown down, and they will never rise again.
